title: The Cord
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we do a social media round-up! Facebook + Instagram's new "Secret Crush" feature, TikTok blowing up "out of nowhere" and claiming Lil Nas X's fame, Netflix removing the binge option? And a new important app update for creatives working in Social Media.

Wellness Segment: HeyFranHey x Maryam Hasnaa's "Embodiment" collection relaunch - Monday, September 23rd at 9 am PST/12 pm EST https://www.etsy.com/shop/ResonanceApothecary

Black Business of the Week: Dominican textile artist, Uzumaki Cepeda's first solo show at a museum. Opening this Friday, September 20th at 7 pm. MoCada Museum. For more information visit http://mocada.org/2019/08/24/uzumaki-cepeda-safe-space

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Stitch Fix is an online personal styling service that delivers your favorite clothing, shoes and accessories, directly to you. Get started today at Stitch Fix https://www.stitchfix.com/FRIENDZONE and get an extra 25% off when you keep everything in your box.

GOAT - Goat is the global destination for authentic sneakers, ranging from new releases to rare finds and exclusive drops. Find the perfect 100% authentic sneaker at https://www.goat.com/FRIENDZONE

Casetify - Create custom cases for your phone with your favorite colors and texts. Military grade drop protection. Go to https://www.casetify.com/FRIENDZONE today to get 20% off your new favorite phone case.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
